puzzle.title: Sin Laws Curb Limit
puzzle.notes: This month's location puzzles is an animated GIF loop.
puzzle.hint: Consider what letters are "exactly opposite" of each other on the dice.
C=U Q=H B=Y M=V N=T J=D O=W P=X K=R I=E A=G F=Z S=L
substituting each letter in "SIN LAWS CURB LIMIT" translates into "LETS GO LUCKY SEVEN"
The solution is LETS GO LUCKY SEVEN
puzzle.solution: View the hints to learn the solition.

puzzle.title: The Get-Away
puzzle.hint: What letters are on the cube?
Start the cube with the correct letter facing up (corresponding to the path you are going to read).
Take the south path (use N) and by rolling and shifting you should end up with "DECODE THIS".
Do another shift on DECODE THIS to get your final answer.

puzzle.title: Downsizing the Gang
puzzle.hint: The blanks should be filled with a word that completes compound words or phrases.
The words are: BATH BOOT CASE GUEST NUT TAGS FLAT FLIGHT REAL OPERA RODS GRAPES
Drop the common letters in each combined block. Repeat to get the final word. Use the numbers from the original entry for ordering.

puzzle.title: Taking the Rap (meta puzzle)
puzzle.hint: Placing HOUND in the spaces 1-5 in the grid will lock ing the ordering of the previous answers.
Read the 5th column from top to bottom.

puzzle.title: Jack Flash Does Vegas (bonus puzzle)
puzzle.hint: "Suit line up" tells you that each of the 21s will connect via a straight line through their suits.
Once you've drawn all the lines the picture may be slightly abstract, but should look like a person leaping over the road. This is a hint as to the answer.
